law.catch_line: Remediation of property as qualified infrastructure project.
law.text: Remediation of a property owned by a governmental agency in accordance with KRS 224.1-510 to 224.1-532 shall qualify as an infrastructure project for the purposes of this chapter.
law.history: Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 128, sec. 15, effective June 21, 2001.
